These blogs are an abridged version of the [**KARES Video Library**](https://kares.foundation/video-library), designed to provide easy-to-access information for KARES families, caregivers, clinicians, and researchers. 

Each article is summarized from informational videos hosted by experts in communication, behavior mental health, guardianship, research, and more.
